'''Shipwreck''' is a scripted interaction in {{poe2}}.

== Background ==
{{Description|Waves batter a splintered hull that doggedly refuses to sink. Whoever abandoned this may have left something behind.}}
Shipwrecks are commonplace in parts of the Deadfire, and can be scavenged for what's left of their cargo.

== Interaction ==
In instances where you don't find a predetermined item (e.g. [[Lord Darryn's Voulge]]), you have a chance to find other random loot. You may search the wreck 2-6 times inclusive (this value is randomized for each shipwreck), but doing so takes 2-4 hours inclusive, and the time taken is random regardless of the item received.

{| class="wikitable"
! Chance
! Result
! Dialogue
! Notes
|-
| 19% || Nothing || {{Description|...and find nothing of value.}}
| -
|-
| 50% || Random loot ||
| See the "Random loot" table below
|-
| 10% || [[Ship upgrades#Colors|Colors]] || {{Description|...and find a tattered old flag.}}
| The flag given depends on the ship being searched - see the above table of locations.
|-
| 10% || [[Currency|Coins]] || {{Description|...and find a chest full of coins.}}
| The amount and type of currency given depends on the ship being searched - see the above table of locations.
|-
| 10% || [[Ship upgrades#Cannons|Cannons]] || {{Description|...and find a cannon in surprisingly good condition.}}
| The cannon given is random given a roll from 0-20, see the table below.
